description:
doc/articles/concurrency_patterns: fix typo
Thanks Michael T. Jones for the rewrite suggestion.
Fixes issue 3178.

messages.text: I disagree with this change. The problem is stated by the previous paragraph.

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go/

http://codereview.appspot.com/5902047/diff/4001/doc/articles/concurrency_patterns.html
File doc/articles/concurrency_patterns.html (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/5902047/diff/4001/doc/articles/concurrency_patterns.html#newcode67
doc/articles/concurrency_patterns.html:67: This could have been a textbook example of what is know as a
s/know/known ?

PTAL.

On 2012/03/24 16:05:26, remyoudompheng wrote:
http://codereview.appspot.com/5902047/diff/4001/doc/articles/concurrency_patterns.html#newcode67
> doc/articles/concurrency_patterns.html:67: This could have been a textbook
> example of what is know as a
> s/know/known ?
Done. Ironical this fix for typo introduced a new typo. :)

subject: code review 5902047: doc/articles/concurrency_patterns: fix typo
